## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 *1
```

# Modelo Linial

## Importar data
```{r}
library(readxl) 
data <- read_excel("LA MOLINA 2014 POTATO WUE (FB).xlsx" , sheet = 2)
head(data)


```
# Modelo linal 
```{r}
modelo <- lm(formula = lfa ~ block + geno + riego +riego*geno, data = data)
anova(modelo)

```
# instalar ggplot2
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

```
# graficar con blox plot
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(geno),y =lfa, fill= factor(riego))) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Grafica de lfa por Genotipo", x = " Genotipo", y = "lfa") + theme_minimal()

```
